sentence: Representative Jim Jordan of Ohio, the ranking Republican on the House Judiciary Committee, has asked the FBI to provide an immediate briefing regarding the agency’s investigation into the pipe bombs left at the headquarters of the Democrat and Republican parties on January 5 last year.
